OrderItemAttribute.name: OrderItemAttribute
OrderItemAttribute.description: Represents a virtual object that stores an attribute specified for an order item.

AttributeDefinitionId.description: The ID of the attribute definition for this order item attribute.

AttributeName.description: The name given to order item attribute.

AttributePicklistValueId.description: The ID of the attribute picklist value if the attribute is a picklist type.

AttributeValue.description: Stores the value of the order item attribute. For example 5-TB storage.

ExternalId.description: An auto-generated ID of the attribute record saved in an external system (for example an HBase database).

OrderItemId.description: The parent order item associated with the order item attribute.
